meanings.definition: The state or quality of not growing.
meanings.sent1: The nongrowths of the desert plants were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The garden was full of nongrowths, like the small rocks and pebbles.
meanings.sent3: The nongrowths in the abandoned garden seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like nongrowths, stagnant and unmoving.
meanings.sent5: The nongrowths in the field were a stark reminder of the harsh conditions.

meanings.sent1: The farmer separated the nongrowths from the healthy crops.
meanings.sent2: The attic was filled with old furniture and nongrowths.
meanings.sent3: The nongrowths in the fridge seemed to be plotting their escape.
meanings.sent4: His collection of nongrowths included vintage toys and dusty books.
meanings.sent5: The pile of nongrowths in the corner grew taller each day.
